gui.item

Class ItemVault

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.common.Vault
      • gui.item.ItemVault
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IVault

    public class ItemVault
extends Vault
    The Item class provides a way to query for ItemModels within the select data backend (A Model superclass or interface could be created for this) 
     Item.find(2) // returns ItemModel with id of 2
    Other findBy* methods may be implemented.
